title: Fakfak
content:
Drawing inspiration from the wildly popular game Flappy Bird, we have created a 2D game that is both familiar and refreshing. Fakfak features a cast of delightful birds and vibrant scenes that will captivate and delight players of all ages. Our game represents the culmination of countless hours of hard work, creativity, and collaboration, and we couldn't be more thrilled to finally share it with the world.

As of now, Fakfak is exclusively available on Android devices, but we hope to expand its reach in the future. We are confident that players will enjoy the challenging gameplay, colorful graphics, and adorable birds that we have poured our hearts into creating. This is only the beginning of our journey, and we look forward to continuing to develop games that bring joy and excitement to people's lives.

Updates (10 October, 2022)

  • The app is now available on Amazon Playstore.
  • So many bugs was fixed, the latest stable app release reached version 1.2.3.
